item.title: [GLOBAL][Containers & Orchestration] - End of life Kubernetes 1.29 notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 24, 08:00 UTC  -  Nov 26, 17:00 UTC

Oct 14, 14:16 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Managed Kubernetes Service.

Start time : 24/11/2025 08:00 UTC
End time : 26/11/2025 17:00 UTC
Service impact : Customers have to anticipate this maintenance in order to adapt to the new Kubernetes version.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, customers using Kubernetes version 1.29 will be migrated to version 1.30.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [RBX/SBG][Containers & Orchestration] - Managed Rancher Service maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 13, 09:00 - 17:00 UTC

Sep 24, 21:37 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Containers & Orchestration offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 13/11/2025 09:00 UTC
End time : 13/11/2025 17:00 UTC
Service impact : None.
Service improvement : Rancher version 2.9.4 end of support is reached since August 2025.
As part of our continuous improvement policy, we need to force upgrade Ranchers to version 2.10.
The Rancher compatibility matrix with downstream clusters will be changed, as K8S version 1.27 will no longer be officially supported.
For more information regarding Managed Rancher Service supported versions and lifecycle policy, you can visit this page: KB0064608

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [GLOBAL][AI & Machine Learning] - Llama incident notification
item.description:
Oct 21, 08:27 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our AI & Machine Learning has been resolved.

Start time : 08/09/2025 10:00 UTC
End time : 16/10/2025 15:00 UTC
Root Cause : A service disruption occurred due to an unexpected infrastructure malfunction.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Oct 16, 04:30 UTC
Update - We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s).

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : Customers using the Llama3.3-70B service are experiencing slowness. Our technical team is working actively on resolving the incident.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Sep 30, 12:50 UTC
Update - We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s).

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : Our technical team is continuing to work on a fix for the issue causing latency on Llama3.3-70B.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Sep 16, 09:03 UTC
Update - We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s).

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : Our technical team continues to work on a fix causing latency on Llama3.3-70B.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Sep 10, 05:01 UTC
Update - We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s).

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : A fix is still being worked on by our team.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Sep 8, 14:24 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an ongoing incident. We have determined the origin of the issue affecting our AI & Machine Learning offering, which is causing temporary latency issue in the global region.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 08/09/2025 10:00 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Latency on Llama3.3-70B.
Customers Impact : Customers using Llama3.3-70B may experience latency.
Root Cause : A service disruption occured due to an unexpected infrastructure malfunction.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.
Workaround : Customers can temporarily use a similar model available on our website.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

item.title: [AP-SOUTHEAST-SYD-2][Containers & Orchestration] - Workflow Management service maintenance notification
item.description:
Oct 17, 06:52 UTC
Completed - The maintenance it has been postponed and will be rescheduled.
A new post will be created when the new schedule has been validated.

Oct 8, 19:52 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Workflow Management service, Mistral.

Here are the details of the maintenance:
Start time : 22/10/2025 18:00 UTC
End time : 22/10/2025 19:00 UTC
Service impact : During this maintenance window for the Workflow Management service (Mistral), you may encounter the following impacts :

- Workflows in progress at the start of the maintenance will be stopped and will be restarted automatically after the maintenance is completed. We understand that this may cause a temporary disruption in your workflow processing, and we apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
- Cron triggers (scheduled workflow executions) during the maintenance period will not be triggered. If you have any workflows scheduled to run during the maintenance window, we recommend rescheduling them to run outside of this timeframe to avoid any disruption.

Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be performing a maintenance on the Mistral service infrastructure. This maintenance is necessary to ensure the continued reliability and performance of our platform.

If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to our support team

item.title: [SGP1][PublicCloud] - OpenStack Barbican maintenance notification
item.description:
Oct 8, 10:19 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Oct 8, 10:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Sep 25, 21:15 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, a maintenance is scheduled on our public cloud infrastructure.

Start time : 08/10/2025 10:00 UTC
End time : 08/10/2025 11:00 UTC
Service impact : Rollout restart of api for applying the change, no impact is expected.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous infrastructure improvement plan, we need to add a new store for Barbican based on OVH KMS(Key Management Services) in SGP1.
This will took effect on the Openstack region in SGP1.
An individual communication will be sent to impacted customers.

Thank you for your understanding.
